pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
pre_caption: This is a static scenery shot of a large recreational vehicle parked at a campsite. The site features a landscaped patio with a retaining wall, outdoor furniture, and a grill. The setting is a peaceful RV park with trees and other campers visible in the background.
